translation.tech-support-hero-subtitle: Judgment-free tech support delivered with patience and plain language. We're here to help with any device or question‚Äîwork with us in person or remotely.
translation.tech-support-audience-1-text: Students, seniors, and anyone starting their tech journey who want patient guidance to build confidence and feel safe online.
translation.tech-support-audience-2-text: Households looking for shared digital literacy practices and healthy tech boundaries.
translation.tech-support-audience-3-text: From quick fixes to building confidence over time, we're here to help in plain language.
translation.tech-support-audience-4-text: Working professionals, unemployed individuals, and career shifters looking to enhance digital skills, learn new tools, or advance their career through technology.
translation.tech-support-step-1-text: We start with a quick intake conversation to understand your needs, goals, and what you'd like to learn or accomplish. This helps us tailor the session to your specific situation.
translation.tech-support-step-2-text: We work together step-by-step, explaining everything in plain language. Whether it's troubleshooting, setting up devices, or building digital confidence, we guide you through each step with patience and no judgment.
translation.tech-support-step-3-text: You receive annotated notes summarizing what we covered, checklists for future reference, and personalized recommendations for building healthy tech habits. Ongoing check-ins are available as needed.
translation.tech-support-card-confidence-session-des: One hour of patient, judgment-free help with take-home notes‚Äîideal for seniors and beginners building confidence.
translation.tech-support-card-confidence-series-desc: Four structured sessions with a curriculum for individuals or families building lasting digital habits.
translation.tech-support-card-learning-bundle-descri: Three focused sessions to master a specific goal (e.g., smartphone essentials, office tools and storage, password managers, messaging and video calls), with guided steps and light homework.
translation.tech-support-card-quick-help-description: 45-minute troubleshooting or setup with annotated recap. Perfect for immediate fixes or understanding how apps and services work.
translation.tech-support-card-drop-in-description: 30-minute remote or caf√© meet-up for quick fixes or app walkthroughs. Great for simple questions and rapid support.
translation.tech-support-card-parent-home-descriptio: 90-minute parent-focused session to understand children's tech interests, set healthy boundaries, and configure home devices together.
translation.tech-support-card-home-visit-description: First-time setup of computers and smartphones, plus hands-on setup for smart home devices, video game consoles, and more, with a tailored checklist and follow-up notes.
translation.tech-support-card-procurement-descriptio: We source new or second-hand devices to your needs, then handle setup and personalization. Device cost appears on the invoice.
translation.tech-support-service-coaching-descriptio: Structured sessions to build digital skills and confidence over time. Ideal for individuals or families building lasting tech habits.
translation.tech-support-format-confidence-session-d: One hour of patient, judgment-free help with take-home notes‚Äîideal for seniors and beginners building confidence.
translation.tech-support-format-confidence-series-de: Four structured sessions with a curriculum for individuals or families building lasting digital habits.
translation.tech-support-format-learning-bundle-desc: Three Confidence Sessions spread over a month with homework assignments and check-ins between sessions.
translation.tech-support-service-quick-help-descript: 45-minute troubleshooting or setup sessions with annotated recaps. Perfect for immediate fixes or understanding how apps and services work.
translation.tech-support-format-quick-help-descripti: 45-minute troubleshooting or setup session with annotated recap. Perfect for immediate fixes or understanding how apps and services work.
translation.tech-support-format-drop-in-description: 30-minute remote or caf√© meet-up for quick fixes or app walkthroughs. Great for simple questions and rapid support.
translation.tech-support-service-family-description: A parent‚Äëfocused session to understand your child‚Äôs tech world and set up a safe, healthy home tech environment. Multiple family members can attend, but the guidance focuses on helping you help them.
translation.tech-support-format-family-tuneup-descri: 90 minutes to review devices and accounts, enable parental controls, set up shared routines, and answer parent questions.
translation.tech-support-format-home-visit-descripti: In‚Äëhome setup for smart home devices, video game consoles, parental controls, shared devices, and practical workflows. Optional device procurement (new or second‚Äëhand) available; device cost included on the invoice.
translation.tech-support-format-onsite-description: Flexible in‚Äëhome setup for more complex environments (smart home devices, consoles, household tech); supports household safety and healthy habits. Optional device procurement (new or second‚Äëhand) available; device cost included on the invoice.
translation.tech-support-expect-session-text: We start by understanding your needs and goals. Then we work together step-by-step, explaining everything in plain language. No judgment, just patient guidance.
translation.tech-support-expect-receive-text: Annotated notes summarizing what we covered, checklists for future reference, and personalized recommendations for building healthy tech habits.
translation.tech-support-expect-inperson-text: In-person sessions across the canton of Vaud are ideal for hands-on setup, faster troubleshooting, and building healthy tech habits at home.
translation.tech-support-expect-remote-text: Remote sessions are available worldwide. Sessions conducted in English or French. Recording available on request.
translation.tech-support-travel-text: Travel is billed at CHF 0.50/km (round trip) from Lausanne, min CHF 5 and max CHF 40. Example: 10 km each way = 20 km total ‚Üí CHF 10 travel. We confirm travel before your appointment.
translation.tech-support-faq-link-description: Have questions about our tech support services, sessions, booking, or policies? Visit our comprehensive FAQ page for detailed answers.
translation.tech-support-faq-1-question: What's the difference between the different session types?
translation.tech-support-faq-1-answer: Confidence Sessions are structured one-hour sessions focused on building digital confidence over time, ideal for beginners. Quick Tech Help is a 45-minute troubleshooting session perfect for immediate fixes. Family sessions cover shared devices and digital habits for households. Series and bundles provide multiple sessions for deeper learning and habit-building.
translation.tech-support-faq-2-answer: Remote sessions are conducted via video call (Zoom, Google Meet, or your preferred platform). We'll send you a link before your session. During the call, we can share screens, walk through processes together, and guide you step-by-step. You'll still receive all the same notes, checklists, and recommendations as in-person sessions.
translation.tech-support-faq-3-question: What should I prepare before a session?
translation.tech-support-faq-3-answer: Before your session, think about what you'd like to accomplish or learn. Have any relevant devices, accounts, or questions ready. For remote sessions, ensure you have a stable internet connection and your device charged. For troubleshooting sessions, note any error messages or issues you've encountered. No technical knowledge is required‚Äîwe'll guide you through everything.
translation.tech-support-faq-4-answer: Absolutely! Many clients benefit from multiple sessions. Series and bundles offer discounted rates for multiple sessions. You can also book individual sessions as needed. We can help you choose the right package based on your goals‚Äîwhether it's building confidence over time, learning specific skills, or ongoing support.
translation.tech-support-faq-5-answer: After each session, you'll receive annotated notes summarizing what we covered, step-by-step checklists for future reference, and personalized recommendations for building healthy tech habits. For series and bundles, you'll get homework assignments between sessions. You can always reach out with follow-up questions, and we're available for additional sessions as needed.
translation.tech-support-faq-6-answer: Yes, we're flexible and can work with you on payment arrangements for series and bundles. Contact us to discuss payment plan options that work for your budget.
translation.tech-support-faq-7-question: Can sessions be recorded for later reference?
translation.tech-support-faq-7-answer: We provide detailed annotated notes and checklists after each session, which serve as your reference guide. Recording sessions can be arranged upon request for an additional fee. However, the notes and checklists are designed to capture everything important without needing a recording.
translation.tech-support-faq-travel-question: How do in-person travel costs work?
translation.tech-support-faq-travel-answer: For in-person visits, travel is billed at CHF 0.50/km from Vaulion or the last customer, with a minimum of CHF 5 and a maximum of CHF 40. We plan routes to minimize your cost, and we confirm the travel amount before your appointment.
translation.tech-support-faq-8-question: Which languages do you support? Where do you travel for in-person?
translation.tech-support-faq-8-answer: We offer sessions in English and French. In-person visits are available across the canton of Vaud and nearby areas; reach out if you‚Äôre unsure about your location.
translation.tech-support-faq-9-question: Who qualifies for the reduced fare?
translation.tech-support-faq-9-answer: Reduced fare is available for seniors, students, and people who are unemployed. If this applies to you, just let us know when booking.
translation.tech-support-faq-10-answer: Cancellations within 24 hours of your appointment are billed at 50% of the session price. There is no fee for cancellations made earlier.
translation.tech-support-faq-11-question: Can you help buy devices for me?
translation.tech-support-faq-11-answer: Yes. We can procure new or second-hand devices based on your preferences and budget. Procurement is billed hourly plus the device cost; we add the device cost to your invoice with receipts.
translation.tech-support-faq-12-question: How do you handle privacy and security?
translation.tech-support-faq-12-answer: We never keep your passwords. If we need temporary access, we‚Äôll guide you to change passwords afterwards. Notes we share avoid sensitive information, and we emphasize safe digital practices.
translation.tech-support-faq-13-answer: Yes. We adapt pace and materials for your needs‚Äîfor example larger-print notes, clearer step-by-step checklists, and slower walkthroughs. Tell us what helps you most.
translation.tech-support-faq-14-question: How do I book? Can family members join?
translation.tech-support-faq-14-answer: Use the centralized booking at the bottom of this page. Our sessions are parent-focused; other family members can participate if helpful, but it isn‚Äôt full-family coaching.
translation.tech-support-faq-15-answer: We focus on setup, configuration, learning, and smart home/console support. We don‚Äôt perform hardware repairs, but we can recommend options if needed.
translation.tech-support-booking-notice: Our booking system is coming soon. We'll notify you when it's ready!
translation.tech-support-booking-note: Stay tuned for updates on when you'll be able to book your tech support sessions directly.
translation.tech-support-policies-travel-details:
CHF 0.50/km from Vaulion or the last customer
min CHF 5, max CHF 40 (CHF 20 for reduced rate)
We plan routes to minimize your cost.
translation.tech-support-reduced-badge: Reduced fare available for all services (seniors, students, unemployed)

translation.tech-support-comparison-family-tuneup: Sesi√≥n de Tecnolog√≠a para Padres y Hogar
translation.tech-support-expect-session-text: Comenzamos entendiendo tus necesidades y objetivos. Luego trabajamos juntos paso a paso, explicando todo en lenguaje sencillo. Sin juicios, solo orientaci√≥n paciente.

translation.tech-support-expect-formats-text: La mayor√≠a de las sesiones funcionan muy bien remotamente por videollamada. Para configuraci√≥n pr√°ctica de dispositivos o sesiones familiares, ofrecemos visitas a domicilio o encuentros en tu ubicaci√≥n.
translation.tech-support-faq-link-description: ¬øTienes preguntas sobre nuestros servicios de soporte t√©cnico, sesiones, reservas o pol√≠ticas? Visita nuestra p√°gina completa de preguntas frecuentes para respuestas detalladas.
translation.tech-support-view-faq: Ver Preguntas Frecuentes de Soporte T√©cnico ‚Üí
translation.tech-support-faq-1-question: ¬øCu√°l es la diferencia entre los diferentes tipos de sesiones?
translation.tech-support-faq-1-answer: Las Sesiones de Confianza son sesiones estructuradas de una hora enfocadas en construir confianza digital con el tiempo, ideales para principiantes. Ayuda Tecnol√≥gica R√°pida es una sesi√≥n de resoluci√≥n de problemas de 45 minutos perfecta para soluciones inmediatas. Las sesiones familiares cubren dispositivos compartidos y h√°bitos digitales para hogares. Las series y paquetes proporcionan m√∫ltiples sesiones para un aprendizaje m√°s profundo y construcci√≥n de h√°bitos.
translation.tech-support-faq-2-answer: Las sesiones remotas se realizan por videollamada (Zoom, Google Meet o tu plataforma preferida). Te enviaremos un enlace antes de tu sesi√≥n. Durante la llamada, podemos compartir pantallas, recorrer procesos juntos y guiarte paso a paso. A√∫n recibir√°s todas las mismas notas, listas de verificaci√≥n y recomendaciones que en las sesiones presenciales.
translation.tech-support-faq-3-question: ¬øQu√© debo preparar antes de una sesi√≥n?
translation.tech-support-faq-3-answer: Antes de tu sesi√≥n, piensa en lo que te gustar√≠a lograr o aprender. Ten listos cualquier dispositivo, cuenta o pregunta relevante. Para sesiones remotas, aseg√∫rate de tener una conexi√≥n a internet estable y tu dispositivo cargado. Para sesiones de resoluci√≥n de problemas, anota cualquier mensaje de error o problema que hayas encontrado. No se requiere conocimiento t√©cnico‚Äîte guiaremos a trav√©s de todo.
translation.tech-support-faq-4-answer: ¬°Por supuesto! Muchos clientes se benefician de m√∫ltiples sesiones. Las series y paquetes ofrecen tarifas con descuento para m√∫ltiples sesiones. Tambi√©n puedes reservar sesiones individuales seg√∫n sea necesario. Podemos ayudarte a elegir el paquete correcto seg√∫n tus objetivos‚Äîya sea construir confianza con el tiempo, aprender habilidades espec√≠ficas o apoyo continuo.
translation.tech-support-faq-5-answer: Despu√©s de cada sesi√≥n, recibir√°s notas anotadas que resumen lo que cubrimos, listas de verificaci√≥n paso a paso para referencia futura y recomendaciones personalizadas para construir h√°bitos tecnol√≥gicos saludables. Para series y paquetes, recibir√°s tareas para el hogar entre sesiones. Siempre puedes contactarnos con preguntas de seguimiento, y estamos disponibles para sesiones adicionales seg√∫n sea necesario.
translation.tech-support-faq-6-answer: S√≠, somos flexibles y podemos trabajar contigo en arreglos de pago para series y paquetes. Cont√°ctanos para discutir opciones de planes de pago que funcionen para tu presupuesto.
translation.tech-support-faq-7-question: ¬øSe pueden grabar las sesiones para referencia posterior?
translation.tech-support-faq-7-answer: Proporcionamos notas anotadas detalladas y listas de verificaci√≥n despu√©s de cada sesi√≥n, que sirven como tu gu√≠a de referencia. La grabaci√≥n de sesiones puede organizarse bajo solicitud por una tarifa adicional. Sin embargo, las notas y listas de verificaci√≥n est√°n dise√±adas para capturar todo lo importante sin necesidad de una grabaci√≥n.
translation.tech-support-faq-travel-question: ¬øC√≥mo funcionan los costos de desplazamiento en persona?
translation.tech-support-faq-travel-answer: Para visitas presenciales, el desplazamiento se factura a CHF 0,50/km desde Vaulion o el √∫ltimo cliente, con un m√≠nimo de CHF 5 y un m√°ximo de CHF 40. Planificamos rutas para minimizar tu costo y confirmamos el monto de desplazamiento antes de tu cita.
translation.tech-support-faq-8-question: ¬øQu√© idiomas ofrecen? ¬øA d√≥nde viajan para sesiones presenciales?
translation.tech-support-faq-8-answer: Ofrecemos sesiones en ingl√©s y franc√©s. Las visitas presenciales est√°n disponibles en el cant√≥n de Vaud y zonas cercanas; cont√°ctanos si no est√°s seguro sobre tu ubicaci√≥n.
translation.tech-support-faq-9-answer: La tarifa reducida est√° disponible para personas mayores, estudiantes y personas desempleadas. Si aplica a tu caso, ind√≠canoslo al reservar.
translation.tech-support-faq-10-answer: Las cancelaciones dentro de las 24 horas de tu cita se facturan al 50% del precio de la sesi√≥n. No hay cargo para cancelaciones con mayor antelaci√≥n.
translation.tech-support-faq-11-answer: S√≠. Podemos adquirir dispositivos nuevos o de segunda mano seg√∫n tus preferencias y presupuesto. La adquisici√≥n se factura por hora m√°s el costo del dispositivo; agregamos el costo del dispositivo a tu factura con recibos.
translation.tech-support-faq-12-question: ¬øC√≥mo manejan la privacidad y la seguridad?
translation.tech-support-faq-12-answer: Nunca guardamos tus contrase√±as. Si necesitamos acceso temporal, te guiaremos para cambiarlas despu√©s. Las notas que compartimos evitan informaci√≥n sensible y enfatizamos pr√°cticas digitales seguras.
translation.tech-support-faq-13-answer: S√≠. Adaptamos el ritmo y los materiales a tus necesidades‚Äîpor ejemplo notas con letra m√°s grande, listas de verificaci√≥n claras y recorridos m√°s lentos. Dinos qu√© te ayuda m√°s.
translation.tech-support-faq-14-answer: Usa la reserva centralizada al final de esta p√°gina. Nuestras sesiones est√°n centradas en los padres; otros familiares pueden participar si ayuda, pero no es un coaching de toda la familia.
translation.tech-support-faq-15-answer: Nos enfocamos en configuraci√≥n, aprendizaje y soporte para hogar inteligente/consolas. No realizamos reparaciones de hardware, pero podemos recomendar opciones si es necesario.
translation.tech-support-booking-notice: Nuestro sistema de reservas llegar√° pronto. ¬°Te notificaremos cuando est√© listo!
translation.tech-support-booking-note: Mantente atento a las actualizaciones sobre cu√°ndo podr√°s reservar tus sesiones de soporte t√©cnico directamente.
translation.tech-support-policies-travel-details:
CHF 0,50/km desde Vaulion o el √∫ltimo cliente
m√≠nimo CHF 5, m√°ximo CHF 40 (CHF 20 tarifa reducida)

translation.tech-support-reduced-badge: Tarifa reducida disponible para todos los servicios (mayores, estudiantes, desempleados)

translation.tech-support-hero-subtitle: Support technique sans jugement, avec patience et langage simple. Nous sommes l√† pour vous aider avec n'importe quel appareil ou question‚Äîtravaillons ensemble en personne ou √† distance.
translation.tech-support-audience-1-text: √âtudiants, personnes √¢g√©es et toute personne commen√ßant son parcours technologique qui souhaite une guidance patiente pour gagner en confiance et se sentir en s√©curit√© en ligne.
